channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-5888|2024-08-06T01:15:10.075Z -- ibm%20corporation -- interact
item.description: IBM Interact 8.6, 9.0, 9.1, and 10.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 115084.

item.title: CVE-2016-6096|2024-08-06T01:22:19.610Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.0.1, 2.5, and 2.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-5882|2024-08-06T01:15:10.727Z -- ibm%20corporation -- domino
item.description: IBM iNotes is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-9691|2024-08-06T02:59:03.103Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20cast%20iron%20cloud%20integration
item.description: IBM WebSphere Cast Iron Solution 7.0.0 and 7.5.0.0 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 119515.

item.title: CVE-2016-8931|2024-08-06T02:35:02.320Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server.

item.title: CVE-2016-9696|2024-08-06T02:59:03.361Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 is vulnerable to HTML injection. A remote attacker could inject malicious HTML code, which when viewed, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site. IBM Reference #: 1999960.

item.title: CVE-2016-8925|2024-08-06T02:35:02.313Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20application%20dependency%20discovery%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager 7.2.2 and 7.3 could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files which could allow the attacker to read any file on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 118538.

item.title: CVE-2015-7418|2024-08-06T07:51:27.399Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20datapower%20xc10%20appliance
item.description: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale and the WebSphere DataPower XC10 Appliance allow some sensitive data to linger in memory instead of being overwritten which could allow a local user with administrator privileges to obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2016-6117|2024-08-06T01:22:20.241Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5 and 2.6 can be deployed with active debugging code that can disclose sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2016-9010|2024-08-06T02:35:02.326Z -- ibm%20corporation -- integration%20bus
item.description: IBM WebSphere Message Broker 9.0 and 10.0 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM Reference #: 1997906.

item.title: CVE-2016-6068|2024-08-06T01:22:19.009Z -- ibm%20corporation -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy could allow an authenticated user with access to the REST endpoints to access API and CLI getResource secured role properties.

item.title: CVE-2016-8918|2024-08-06T02:35:02.297Z -- ibm%20corporation -- integration%20bus
item.description: IBM Integration Bus, under non default configurations, could allow a remote user to authenticate without providing valid credentials.

item.title: CVE-2016-5958|2024-08-06T01:15:10.837Z -- ibm%20corporation -- privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the secure flag for the session cookie in SSL mode. By intercepting its transmission within an HTTP session, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to capture the cookie and obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2016-6084|2024-08-06T01:22:18.986Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform could allow an attacker on the local network to crash the BES server using a specially crafted XMLSchema request.

item.title: CVE-2016-6054|2024-08-06T01:22:18.931Z -- ibm%20corporation -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-8921|2024-08-06T02:35:02.312Z -- ibm%20corporation -- filenet%20content%20manager
item.description: IBM FileNet WorkPlace XT could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server.

item.title: CVE-2016-5881|2024-08-06T01:15:09.894Z -- ibm%20corporation -- inotes
item.description: IBM iNotes is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-8960|2024-08-06T02:35:02.336Z -- ibm%20corporation -- cognos%20business%20intelligence
item.description: IBM Cognos Business Intelligence 10.2 could allow a user with lower privilege Capabilities to adopt the Capabilities of a higher-privilege user by intercepting the higher-privilege user's cookie value from its HTTP request and then reusing it in subsequent requests. IBM Reference #: 1993718.

item.title: CVE-2016-6031|2024-08-06T01:15:10.890Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 2000784.

item.title: CVE-2016-5933|2024-08-06T01:15:09.988Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20monitoring%20v6
item.description: IBM Tivoli Monitoring 6.2 and 6.3 is vulnerable to possible host header injection attack that could lead to HTTP cache poisoning or firewall bypass. IBM Reference #: 1997223.

item.title: CVE-2016-6022|2024-08-06T01:15:10.835Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Quality Manager (RQM) 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 2000784.

item.title: CVE-2016-8935|2024-08-06T02:35:02.355Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1, 13.2, 13.2.2, 13.2.3, 13.2.4 and 14.0.0 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1999483.

item.title: CVE-2016-8913|2024-08-06T02:35:02.294Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-5952|2024-08-06T01:15:10.623Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.

item.title: CVE-2016-8977|2024-08-06T02:35:02.890Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: IBM BigFix Inventory v9 could disclose sensitive information to an unauthorized user using HTTP GET requests. This information could be used to mount further attacks against the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-8971|2024-08-06T02:35:02.823Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ 8.0 could allow an authenticated user with queue manager permissions to cause a segmentation fault which would result in the box having to be rebooted to resume normal operations. IBM Reference #: 1998663.

item.title: CVE-2015-1976|2024-08-06T05:02:42.937Z -- ibm%20corporation -- directory%20server
item.description: IBM Security Directory Server could allow an authenticated user to execute commands into the web administration tool that would cause the tool to crash.

item.title: CVE-2016-8968|2024-08-06T02:35:02.327Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1998515.

item.title: CVE-2016-8954|2024-08-06T02:35:02.288Z -- ibm%20corporation -- dashdb%20local
item.description: IBM dashDB Local uses hard-coded credentials that could allow a remote attacker to gain access to the Docker container or database.

item.title: CVE-2016-8926|2024-08-06T02:35:02.314Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20application%20dependency%20discovery%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager 7.2.2 and 7.3 could allow a remote attacker to read system files or data that is restricted to authorized users. IBM X-Force ID: 118539.

item.title: CVE-2016-9727|2024-08-06T02:59:03.353Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM Reference #: 1999542.

item.title: CVE-2016-6112|2024-08-06T01:22:20.588Z -- ibm%20corporation -- marketing%20platform
item.description: IBM Distributed Marketing and Marketing Platform 8.6, 9.0, 9.1, and 10.0 could allow an authenticated user to escalate their privileges and gain administrative permissions over the web application. IBM X-Force ID: 118282.

item.title: CVE-2016-9737|2024-08-06T02:59:03.308Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tririga%20application%20platform
item.description: IBM TRIRIGA 3.3, 3.4, and 3.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1996200.

item.title: CVE-2016-6059|2024-08-06T01:22:20.536Z -- ibm%20corporation -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources.

item.title: CVE-2016-6045|2024-08-06T01:22:20.635Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager%20extended%20edition
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Operations Center is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts.

item.title: CVE-2016-5889|2024-08-06T01:15:09.830Z -- ibm%20corporation -- interact
item.description: IBM Interact 8.6, 9.0, 9.1, and 10.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 115085.

item.title: CVE-2016-9693|2024-08-06T02:59:03.295Z -- ibm%20corporation -- business%20process%20manager%20advanced
item.description: IBM Business Process Manager 7.5, 8.0, and 8.5 has a file download capability that is vulnerable to a set of attacks. Ultimately, an attacker can cause an unauthenticated victim to download a malicious payload. An existing file type restriction can be bypassed so that the payload might be considered executable and cause damage on the victim's machine. IBM Reference #: 1998655.

item.title: CVE-2016-9739|2024-08-06T02:59:03.353Z -- ibm%20corporation -- identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user.

item.title: CVE-2016-9724|2024-08-06T02:59:03.270Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources. IBM Reference #: 1999537.

item.title: CVE-2016-6042|2024-08-06T01:22:19.001Z -- ibm%20corporation -- appscan%20enterprise
item.description: IBM AppScan Enterprise Edition could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper handling of objects in memory. By persuading a victim to open specially-crafted content, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system in the same context as the victim.

item.title: CVE-2016-6056|2024-08-06T01:22:18.910Z -- ibm%20corporation -- call%20center%20for%20commerce
item.description: IBM Call Center for Commerce 9.3 and 9.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 2000442.

item.title: CVE-2016-6104|2024-08-06T01:22:20.038Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5, and 2.6 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.

item.title: CVE-2016-8938|2024-08-06T02:35:02.317Z -- ibm%20corporation -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy could allow a user to execute code using a specially crafted file upload that would replace code on the server. This code could be executed on the UCD agent machines that host customer's production applications.

item.title: CVE-2016-8998|2024-08-06T02:35:02.321Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Server 7.1 could allow an authenticated user with TSM administrator privileges to cause a buffer overflow using a specially crafted SQL query and execute arbitrary code on the server. IBM Reference #: 1998747.

item.title: CVE-2016-8982|2024-08-06T02:35:02.563Z -- ibm%20corporation -- infosphere%20datastage
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history.

item.title: CVE-2016-5880|2024-08-06T01:15:10.023Z -- ibm%20corporation -- domino
item.description: IBM iNotes is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6102|2024-08-06T01:22:20.339Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5 and 2.6 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM Reference #: 2000359.

item.title: CVE-2016-9750|2024-08-06T02:59:03.553Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 and 7.3 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 120207.

item.title: CVE-2016-8922|2024-08-06T02:35:02.294Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20portal
item.description: Exphox WebRadar is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6040|2024-08-06T01:22:18.974Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation could allow an authenticated user to take over a previously logged in user due to session expiration not being enforced.

item.title: CVE-2016-5896|2024-08-06T01:15:10.790Z -- ibm%20corporation -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management could disclose sensitive information from a stack trace after submitting incorrect login onto Cognos browser.

item.title: CVE-2016-5950|2024-08-06T01:15:10.599Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2016-8934|2024-08-06T02:35:02.332Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20application%20server%20for%20bluemix
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-9740|2024-08-06T02:59:03.526Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 could allow a remote attacker to consume all resources on the server due to not properly restricting the size or amount of resources requested by an actor. IBM Reference #: 1999556.

item.title: CVE-2016-9720|2024-08-06T02:59:03.362Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM Reference #: 1999533.

item.title: CVE-2016-5939|2024-08-06T01:15:10.621Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.

item.title: CVE-2016-5937|2024-08-06T01:15:10.624Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts.

item.title: CVE-2016-9694|2024-08-06T02:59:03.357Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1999960.

IBM Maximo Asset Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-9748|2024-08-06T02:59:03.390Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation 5.0 and 6.0 discloses sensitive information in error response messages that could be used for further attacks against the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-9006|2024-08-06T02:35:02.554Z -- ibm%20corporation -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy 6.1 and 6.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: C1000264.

item.title: CVE-2016-9985|2024-08-06T03:07:31.598Z -- ibm%20corporation -- cognos%20business%20intelligence
item.description: IBM Cognos Server 10.1.1 and 10.2 stores highly sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM Reference #: 1999671.

item.title: CVE-2016-6061|2024-08-06T01:22:18.928Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-5894|2024-08-06T01:15:10.793Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20commerce%20enterprise
item.description: IBM WebSphere Commerce Enterprise, Professional, Express, and Developer 7.0 and 8.0 is vulnerable to information disclosure vulnerability. A local user could view a plain text password in a Unix console. IBM Reference #: 1997408.

item.title: CVE-2016-9009|2024-08-06T02:35:02.449Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ 8.0 could allow an authenticated user with authority to create a cluster object to cause a denial of service to MQ clustering. IBM Reference #: 1998647.

item.title: CVE-2016-8980|2024-08-06T02:35:02.296Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: IBM BigFix Inventory v9 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources.

item.title: CVE-2016-5951|2024-08-06T01:15:10.598Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-8928|2024-08-06T02:35:02.332Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.

item.title: CVE-2016-8942|2024-08-06T02:35:02.283Z -- ibm%20corporation -- spectrum%20control%20standard%20select%20edition
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Productivity Center could allow an authenticated user with intimate knowledge of the system to edit a limited set of properties on the server.

item.title: CVE-2016-5938|2024-08-06T01:15:10.617Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-6077|2024-08-06T01:22:18.942Z -- ibm%20corporation -- cognos%20disclosure%20management
item.description: IBM Cognos Disclosure Management 10.2 could allow a malicious attacker to execute commands as a lower privileged user that opens a malicious document. IBM Reference #: 1991584.

item.title: CVE-2016-6126|2024-08-06T01:22:19.892Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-8920|2024-08-06T02:35:02.285Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-9731|2024-08-06T02:59:03.466Z -- ibm%20corporation -- business%20process%20manager%20advanced
item.description: IBM Business Process Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6082|2024-08-06T01:22:19.004Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free race condition. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-5935|2024-08-06T01:15:10.036Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20components
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly validate the SSL certificate. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques.

item.title: CVE-2016-5953|2024-08-06T01:15:10.785Z -- ibm%20corporation -- sterling%20order%20management
item.description: IBM Sterling Order Management transmits the session identifier within the URL. When a user is unable to view a certain view due to not being allowed permissions, the website responds with an error page where the session identifier is encoded as Base64 in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2016-6039|2024-08-06T01:22:20.595Z -- ibm%20corporation -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-8974|2024-08-06T02:35:02.320Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 4.0, 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources. IBM Reference #: 1997798.

item.title: CVE-2016-8967|2024-08-06T02:35:02.278Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: IBM BigFix Inventory v9 9.2 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user.

item.title: CVE-2016-5948|2024-08-06T01:15:10.497Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-8962|2024-08-06T02:35:02.355Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: IBM BigFix Inventory 9.2 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 118851.

item.title: CVE-2016-9723|2024-08-06T02:59:03.415Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1999534.

item.title: CVE-2016-6110|2024-08-06T01:22:19.780Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager discloses unencrypted login credentials to Vmware vCenter that could be obtained by a local user.

item.title: CVE-2016-9706|2024-08-06T02:59:03.302Z -- ibm%20corporation -- integration%20bus
item.description: IBM Integration Bus 9.0 and 10.0 and WebSphere Message Broker SOAP FLOWS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources. IBM Reference #: 1997918.

item.title: CVE-2016-9728|2024-08-06T02:59:03.475Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM Qradar 7.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, information in the back-end database. IBM Reference #: 1999543.

item.title: CVE-2015-7493|2024-08-06T07:51:28.060Z -- ibm%20corporation -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server could allow a local user under special circumstances to execute commands during installation processes that could expose sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2016-5897|2024-08-06T01:15:10.809Z -- ibm%20corporation -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) is vulnerable to HTML injection. A remote attacker could inject malicious HTML code, which when viewed, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site.

item.title: CVE-2016-5919|2024-08-06T01:15:10.197Z -- ibm%20corporation -- access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager for Web 7.0.0, 8.0.0, and 9.0.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM Reference #: 1996868.

item.title: CVE-2016-6085|2024-08-06T01:22:19.662Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform could allow an attacker on the local network to crash the BES and relay servers.

item.title: CVE-2016-8973|2024-08-06T02:35:02.340Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 4.0, 5.0 and 6.0 contains an undisclosed vulnerability that may allow an authenticated user to upload infected malicious files to the server. IBM Reference #: 1999960.

item.title: CVE-2016-6105|2024-08-06T01:22:19.995Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5 and 2.6 do not perform an authentication check for a critical resource or functionality allowing anonymous users access to protected areas.

item.title: CVE-2016-9992|2024-08-06T03:07:31.692Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud 9.0, and 10.0.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM Reference #: 1992067.

item.title: CVE-2016-8986|2024-08-06T02:35:02.362Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ 8.0 could allow an authenticated user with access to the queue manager to bring down MQ channels using specially crafted HTTP requests. IBM Reference #: 1998648.

item.title: CVE-2016-8919|2024-08-06T02:35:02.271Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server may be vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by allowing serialized objects from untrusted sources to run and cause the consumption of resources.

item.title: CVE-2016-8944|2024-08-06T02:35:02.355Z -- ibm%20corporation -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1 and 7.2 allows a local user to open a file with a specially crafted argument that would crash the system. IBM APARs: IV91488, IV91487, IV91456, IV90234.

item.title: CVE-2016-8929|2024-08-06T02:35:02.312Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.

item.title: CVE-2016-5966|2024-08-06T01:15:10.889Z -- ibm%20corporation -- privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager Virtual Appliance could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques.

item.title: CVE-2016-6047|2024-08-06T01:22:20.618Z -- ibm%20corporation -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-5979|2024-08-06T01:15:10.706Z -- ibm%20corporation -- distributed%20marketing
item.description: IBM Distributed Marketing 8.6, 9.0, and 10.0 could allow a privileged authenticated user to create an instance that gets created with security profile not valid for the templates, that results in the new instance not accessible for the intended user. IBM X-Force ID: 116379.

item.title: CVE-2016-9704|2024-08-06T02:59:03.286Z -- ibm%20corporation -- identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6043|2024-08-06T01:22:18.933Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager%20extended%20edition
item.description: Tivoli Storage Manager Operations Center could allow a local user to take over a previously logged in user due to session expiration not being enforced.

item.title: CVE-2016-8943|2024-08-06T02:35:02.322Z -- ibm%20corporation -- spectrum%20control%20standard%20select%20edition
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Productivity Center is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-8963|2024-08-06T02:35:02.300Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: IBM BigFix Inventory v9 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user.

item.title: CVE-2016-5940|2024-08-06T01:15:10.550Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-5918|2024-08-06T01:15:10.735Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager%20hsm%20for%20windows
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager HSM for Windows displays the encrypted Tivoli Storage Manager password in application trace output if the password access option is prompt and the password is changed.

item.title: CVE-2016-8930|2024-08-06T02:35:02.314Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.

item.title: CVE-2016-8917|2024-08-06T02:35:02.277Z -- ibm%20corporation -- sterling%20order%20management
item.description: IBM Sterling Order Management 9.2 - 9.5 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM Reference #: 2000943.

item.title: CVE-2016-5990|2024-08-06T01:15:10.834Z -- ibm%20corporation -- privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager Virtual Appliance allows an authenticated user to upload malicious files that would be automatically executed by the server.

item.title: CVE-2016-9008|2024-08-06T02:35:02.658Z -- ibm%20corporation -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy could allow a malicious user to access the Agent Relay ActiveMQ Broker JMX interface and run plugins on the agent.

item.title: CVE-2016-6124|2024-08-06T01:22:20.553Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server.

item.title: CVE-2016-8981|2024-08-06T02:35:02.349Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: IBM BigFix Inventory v9 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-6037|2024-08-06T01:22:20.663Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Team Concert (RTC) is vulnerable to HTML injection. A remote attacker with project administrator privileges could send a project that contains malicious HTML code, which when the project is viewed, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site. IBM X-Force ID: 116918.

item.title: CVE-2016-6123|2024-08-06T01:22:20.565Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-9697|2024-08-06T02:59:03.186Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: An unspecified vulnerability in IBM Rhapsody DM 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 could allow an attacker to perform a JSON Hijacking Attack. A JSON Hijacking Attack may expose to an attacker information passed between the server and the browser. IBM Reference #: 1999960.

item.title: CVE-2016-6072|2024-08-06T01:22:18.986Z -- ibm%20corporation -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-9994|2024-08-06T03:07:31.885Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud 9.0, and 10.0.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM Reference #: 1976805.

item.title: CVE-2016-5883|2024-08-06T01:15:09.823Z -- ibm%20corporation -- inotes
item.description: IBM iNotes 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1997010.

item.title: CVE-2016-6116|2024-08-06T01:22:20.472Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5 and 2.6 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques.

item.title: CVE-2016-5900|2024-08-06T01:15:10.758Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tealeaf%20customer%20experience
item.description: IBM Tealeaf Customer Experience on Cloud Network Capture Add-On could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly validate the TLS certificate. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques.

item.title: CVE-2016-5984|2024-08-06T01:15:10.474Z -- ibm%20corporation -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is vulnerable to cross-frame scripting, caused by insufficient HTML iframe protection. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to navigate to a web page the attacker controls. An attacker could use this vulnerability to conduct clickjacking or other client-side browser attacks.

item.title: CVE-2016-6092|2024-08-06T01:22:19.750Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.0.1, 2.5, and 2.6 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user.

item.title: CVE-2016-9692|2024-08-06T02:59:03.244Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20cast%20iron%20cloud%20integration
item.description: IBM WebSphere Cast Iron Solution 7.0.0 and 7.5.0.0 is vulnerable to External Service Interaction attack, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to induce the application to perform server-side DNS lookups or HTTP requests to arbitrary domain names. By submitting suitable payloads, an attacker can cause the application server to attack other systems that it can interact with. IBM X-Force ID: 119516.

item.title: CVE-2016-5932|2024-08-06T01:15:10.786Z -- ibm%20corporation -- connections
item.description: IBM Connections 4.0, 4.5, 5.0, and 5.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1998294.

item.title: CVE-2016-5985|2024-08-06T01:15:10.459Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager
item.description: The IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (IBM Spectrum Protect) AIX client is vulnerable to a buffer overflow when Journal-Based Backup is enabled. A local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a system crash.

item.title: CVE-2016-6032|2024-08-06T01:22:19.018Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Team Concert 4.0, 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6079|2024-08-06T01:22:19.707Z -- ibm%20corporation -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 5.3, 6.1, 7.1, and 7.2 contains an unspecified vulnerability that would allow a locally authenticated user to obtain root level privileges. IBM APARs: IV88658, IV87981, IV88419, IV87640, IV88053.

item.title: CVE-2016-6028|2024-08-06T01:15:10.863Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz technology based products might allow an attacker to view work item titles that they do not have privilege to view.

item.title: CVE-2016-8961|2024-08-06T02:35:02.322Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: IBM BigFix Inventory v9 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim.

item.title: CVE-2016-9729|2024-08-06T02:59:03.315Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 does not perform an authentication check for a critical resource or functionality allowing anonymous users access to protected areas. IBM Reference #: 1999545.

item.title: CVE-2016-6033|2024-08-06T01:22:19.015Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager%20for%20virtual%20environments
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager for Virtual Environments 7.1 (VMware) is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM Reference #: 1995545.

item.title: CVE-2016-6030|2024-08-06T01:15:10.728Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-8911|2024-08-06T02:35:02.839Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim.

item.title: CVE-2016-9976|2024-08-06T03:07:31.851Z -- ibm%20corporation -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.1, 7.5, and 7.6 could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server. IBM X-Force ID: 120252.

item.title: CVE-2016-6095|2024-08-06T01:22:20.624Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5 and 2.6 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials.

item.title: CVE-2016-6055|2024-08-06T01:22:19.001Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1995515.

item.title: CVE-2016-5994|2024-08-06T01:15:10.591Z -- ibm%20corporation -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server contains a vulnerability that would allow an authenticated user to browse any file on the engine tier, and examine its contents.

item.title: CVE-2016-6090|2024-08-06T01:22:20.555Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20commerce%20enterprise
item.description: IBM WebSphere Commerce contains an unspecified vulnerability that could allow disclosure of user personal data, performing of unauthorized administrative operations, and potentially causing a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2016-9730|2024-08-06T02:59:03.431Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar Incident Forensics 7.2 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM Reference #: 1999549.

item.title: CVE-2016-6001|2024-08-06T01:15:10.793Z -- ibm%20corporation -- forms%20experience%20builder
item.description: IBM Forms Experience Builder could be susceptible to a server-side request forgery (SSRF) from the application design interface allowing for some information disclosure of internal resources.

item.title: CVE-2016-6103|2024-08-06T01:22:19.684Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5 and 2.6 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts.

item.title: CVE-2016-5964|2024-08-06T01:15:10.781Z -- ibm%20corporation -- privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager Virtual Appliance version 2.0.2 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials.

item.title: CVE-2016-5980|2024-08-06T01:15:10.906Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tririga%20application%20platform
item.description: IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6099|2024-08-06T01:22:19.614Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5 and 2.6 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-6111|2024-08-06T01:22:20.742Z -- ibm%20corporation -- cram%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 6.0 and 7.0 are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources. IBM Reference #: 2000833.

item.title: CVE-2016-6065|2024-08-06T01:22:20.323Z -- ibm%20corporation -- guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Database Activity Monitor appliance could allow a local user to inject commands that would be executed as root.

item.title: CVE-2015-7494|2024-08-06T07:51:28.123Z -- ibm%20corporation -- cloud%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in IBM Cloud Orchestrator services/[action]/launch API. An authenticated domain admin user might modify cross domain resources via a /services/[action]/launch API call, provided it would have been possible for the domain admin user to gain access to a resource identifier of the other domain.

item.title: CVE-2016-9707|2024-08-06T02:59:03.414Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources. IBM Reference #: 2000784.

item.title: CVE-2016-6125|2024-08-06T01:22:20.578Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-5934|2024-08-06T01:15:10.134Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager%20fastback
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack installer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By placing a specially-crafted DLL in the victim's path, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability when the installer is executed to run arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the victim.

item.title: CVE-2016-6034|2024-08-06T01:22:20.651Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager%20for%20virtual%20environments
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager for Virtual Environments (VMware) could disclose the Windows domain credentials to a user with a high level of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2016-6062|2024-08-06T01:22:20.581Z -- ibm%20corporation -- resilient
item.description: IBM Resilient v26.0, v26.1, and v26.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference#: 213457065.

item.title: CVE-2016-8924|2024-08-06T02:35:02.340Z -- ibm%20corporation -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.1, 7.5 and 7.6 could allow a remote attacker to hijack a user's session, caused by the failure to invalidate an existing session identifier. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to another user's session. IBM X-Force ID: 118537.

item.title: CVE-2016-8999|2024-08-06T02:35:02.323Z -- ibm%20corporation -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server contains a Path-relative stylesheet import vulnerability that allows attackers to render a page in quirks mode thereby facilitating an attacker to inject malicious CSS.

item.title: CVE-2016-8966|2024-08-06T02:35:02.678Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: IBM BigFix Inventory v9 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques.

item.title: CVE-2016-9703|2024-08-06T02:59:03.334Z -- ibm%20corporation -- identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance does not invalidate session tokens which could allow an unauthorized user with physical access to the work station to obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2016-9005|2024-08-06T02:35:02.569Z -- ibm%20corporation -- system%20storage
item.description: IBM System Storage TS3100-TS3200 Tape Library could allow an unauthenticated user with access to the company network, to change a user's password and gain remote access to the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-8933|2024-08-06T02:35:02.314Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing dot dot sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-8927|2024-08-06T02:35:02.364Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20application%20dependency%20discovery%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager 7.2.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 118540.

item.title: CVE-2016-8972|2024-08-06T02:35:02.333Z -- ibm%20corporation -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 6.1, 7.1, and 7.2 could allow a local user to gain root privileges using a specially crafted command within the bellmail client. IBM APARs: IV91006, IV91007, IV91008, IV91010, IV91011.

item.title: CVE-2016-9725|2024-08-06T02:59:03.538Z -- ibm%20corporation -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar Incident Forensics 7.2 allows for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS), which is a mechanism that allows web sites to request resources from external sites, avoiding the need to duplicate them. IBM Reference #: 1999539.

item.title: CVE-2016-5988|2024-08-06T01:15:10.862Z -- ibm%20corporation -- privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager Virtual Appliance could disclose sensitive information in generated error messages that would be available to an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2016-5941|2024-08-06T01:15:10.423Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing dot dot sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-6080|2024-08-06T01:22:20.734Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20message%20broker
item.description: The WebAdmin context for WebSphere Message Broker allows directory listings which could disclose sensitive information to the attacker.

item.title: CVE-2016-8936|2024-08-06T02:35:02.315Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM Social Rendering Templates for Digital Data Connector is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-8915|2024-08-06T02:35:02.297Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ 8.0 could allow an authenticated user with access to the queue manager and queue, to deny service to other channels running under the same process. IBM Reference #: 1998649.

item.title: CVE-2016-9990|2024-08-06T03:07:31.409Z -- ibm%20corporation -- inotes
item.description: IBM iNotes 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1998824.

item.title: CVE-2016-8941|2024-08-06T02:35:02.479Z -- ibm%20corporation -- spectrum%20control%20standard%20select%20edition
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Productivity Center is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts.

item.title: CVE-2016-9000|2024-08-06T02:35:02.577Z -- ibm%20corporation -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere DataStage is vulnerable to cross-frame scripting, caused by insufficient HTML iframe protection. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to navigate to a web page the attacker controls. An attacker could use this vulnerability to conduct clickjacking or other client-side browser attacks.

item.title: CVE-2016-9975|2024-08-06T03:07:31.490Z -- ibm%20corporation -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.2.1 and 1.1.3 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM Reference #: 1998714.

item.title: CVE-2016-6046|2024-08-06T01:22:19.902Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager%20extended%20edition
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Operations Center is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6035|2024-08-06T01:22:19.019Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 116896.

item.title: CVE-2016-5949|2024-08-06T01:15:10.710Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive user data with a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2016-8912|2024-08-06T02:35:02.268Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 stores potentially sensitive information in in log files that could be read by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2016-6020|2024-08-06T01:15:10.633Z -- ibm%20corporation -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim.

item.title: CVE-2016-9735|2024-08-06T02:59:03.501Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from stack traces. IBM X-Force ID: 119781,

item.title: CVE-2016-6097|2024-08-06T01:22:18.988Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.0.1, 2.5, and 2.6 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system.

item.title: CVE-2016-6115|2024-08-06T01:22:20.618Z -- ibm%20corporation -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM General Parallel File System is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. A remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the server to crash.

item.title: CVE-2016-6036|2024-08-06T01:22:20.619Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager (RQM) 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 2000784.

item.title: CVE-2016-6122|2024-08-06T01:22:19.806Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud 13.1 and 13.2 - 13.2.4 discloses answers to security questions in a response to authenticated users.

item.title: CVE-2016-6094|2024-08-06T01:22:18.981Z -- ibm%20corporation -- key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 2.0.1, 2.5, and 2.6 generates an error message that includes sensitive information about its environment, users, or associated data.

item.title: CVE-2016-8940|2024-08-06T02:35:02.336Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (IBM Spectrum Protect) 6.1, 6.2, 6.3, and 7.1 does not perform sufficient authority checking on SQL queries. As a result, an attacker is able to submit SQL queries that access database tables that are not intended for access or use by administrators. The access of these product specific database tables may allow access to passwords or other sensitive information for the product. IBM Reference #: 1998946.

item.title: CVE-2016-6113|2024-08-06T01:22:20.775Z -- ibm%20corporation -- domino
item.description: IBM Verse is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6060|2024-08-06T01:22:20.655Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: An undisclosed vulnerability in IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 could allow a JazzGuest user to see project names. IBM Reference #: 1995547.

item.title: CVE-2016-5942|2024-08-06T01:15:10.781Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-9993|2024-08-06T03:07:31.650Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lcms%20premier%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LCMS Premier on Cloud 9.0, and 10.0.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM Reference #: 1992067.

item.title: CVE-2016-5898|2024-08-06T01:15:10.015Z -- ibm%20corporation -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by not restricting JSON serialization. By sending a direct request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2016-8932|2024-08-06T02:35:02.315Z -- ibm%20corporation -- kenexa%20lms%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable server.

item.title: CVE-2016-6044|2024-08-06T01:22:18.986Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tivoli%20storage%20manager%20extended%20edition
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Operations Center could allow an authenticated attacker to enable or disable the application's REST API, which may let the attacker violate security policy.

item.title: CVE-2016-6000|2024-08-06T01:15:10.786Z -- ibm%20corporation -- tririga%20application%20platform
item.description: IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2015-5013|2024-08-06T06:32:31.950Z -- ibm%20corporation -- access%20manager
item.description: The IBM Security Access Manager appliance includes configuration files that contain obfuscated plaintext-passwords which authenticated users can access.

item.title: CVE-2016-5899|2024-08-06T01:15:10.015Z -- ibm%20corporation -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2016-6100|2024-08-06T01:22:20.539Z -- ibm%20corporation -- atlas%20policy%20suite
item.description: IBM Disposal and Governance Management for IT and IBM Global Retention Policy and Schedule Management, components of IBM Atlas Policy Suite 6.0.3 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM Reference #: 2000771.
